specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Bonded Bonded fabric is created by fusing two different layers into one, which improves durability. When a winter outer layer is combined with a warm lining, it enhances insulation while also supporting a structured, defined silhouette.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Knit > Double > Scuba This fabric may get wrinkles if it is folded and left for a long time, so be careful when handling or storing it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Thermal Resistance Thermal resistance helps block the transfer of heat, keeping warmth in and cold out. It improves insulation and enhances comfort in cold weather. Durable Chlorine Resistance Durable chlorine resistance allows the fabric to withstand repeated exposure to chlorine without fading or breaking down, making it ideal for swimwear and other water-related uses. Grin-through Reduction Grin-through reduction helps prevent spandex or inner layers from showing through when the fabric is stretched. It improves color depth and fabric coverage, enhancing the garment’s overall appearance. Brand Yarn Creora® Creora® is a spandex with high power and excellent heat resistance, which maintains its fabric power even setting at high temperature or re-dyeing. In particular, this offers outstanding deeper color and better fastness, dyed with disperse dye stuff. Recommended Use Activewear, Dresses, Outer, Swimwear
